title: En Uyir Kadhale Lyrics Kettavan
stanzas:
En uyir kadhale
nee engae ponaaye
nee illaa vazhkai
valikkuthadi

en moochin swasathil
nee kalandhayadi
nee ippo kaatrodu
maraindhu vittaai.

en thavaraa
anbae un thavaraa
en kadhalin vedhanai
puriyalaiyaa

anbaeen thavaraa
anbae un thavaraa
en idhayathai therinju
yaen nogadithaai.

En uyir kadhale
nee engae ponaaye
nee illaa vazhkai
valikkuthadi

en moochin swasathil
nee kalandhayadi
nee ippo kaatrodu
maraindhu vittaai.

Adi kadhal pichchai podu
ennai nee vazha vai
oru murai sollu ne
en kadhali indru (2)

ennai nee paradi
enthan kanneer thuli
idhai paarthu ennai
konjam sirikka vai.(2)

En uyir kadhale
nee engae ponaaye
nee illaa vazhkai
valikkuthadi

en moochin swasathil
nee kalandhayadi
nee ippo kaatrodu
maraindhu vittaai.

adi oru varusham
unnai pirindhu
naan vazhkindren.
unnai ninaithu
dhinam saagukiren(2)

adutha jenmam varai
naan kaathiruppen
en kadhalukku
naan poraaduven(2)

En uyir kadhale
nee engae ponaaye
nee illaa vazhkai
valikkuthadi

en moochin swasathil
nee kalandhayadi
nee ippo kaatrodu
maraindhu vittaai.

en thavaraa
anbae un thavaraa
en kadhalin vedhanai
puriyalaiyaa

anbaeen thavaraa
anbae un thavaraa
en idhayathai therinju
yaen nogadithaai.

En uyir kadhale
nee engae ponaaye
nee illaa vazhkai
valikkuthadi

en moochin swasathil
nee kalandhayadi
nee ippo kaatrodu
maraindhu vittaai.
